remarks: The product of a family of topological groups is a topological group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
prdstgpd.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdstgpd.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdstgpd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdstgpd.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> TopGrp ) $.
prdstgpd $p |- ( ph -> Y e. TopGrp ) $.
